Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed (fired reddish) below, two added white bands and alternating white and added red tongues; trace of brown-fired glaze on top of rim; exterior: paired hook maeander band between brown lines; reserved below; dipinto inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2007) (phase 2)
